name: Dawn Void
description:
A Futuristic Robot (Player) defending the city from the Bad Robots using his Black Hole Gun.

How To Play:

Use WASD or ARROW to move the character while rotating camera using the mouse.

LEFT MOUSE CLICK to shoot your black hole at the bad robots to kill them.

Developed by:

- Yahya Lazrek (UU Soft)

- Badr Tebaa

Special Thanks to:

- Salma Rouibah

MAIN GOAL IS TO BEAT YOUR HIGHEST SCORE

HAVE FUN
